body: Hi @jwagner, I apologize, I did mean to file this on smartcrop-node and instead filed it here. Oops!
@jwagner To integrate face detection in smartcrop.js, you can refer to this js lib:https://trackingjs.com/ ,maybe it can help you

Thank you @jwagner for the fast reply.

Thanks for the explanations also.
@jwagner does that explanation still hold even though I disabled `edgeDetect` and `saturationDetect` for that first image?

Hi @jwagner , 

Good work. I was trying on the test bed an image and it seems the cat is not detected.

Attaching image for reference. What I was trying was reducing the width and height also, the cat's face was not detected.
